description: Suspicious scheduled task created outside the approved maintenance window.
Unusually large outbound data transfer detected to an unclassified external IP.
Multiple failed logins followed by a successful authentication from the same IP.
Execution of a PowerShell command containing a Base64-encoded payload.
Outbound connection detected to a domain previously flagged for phishing activity.
Lateral movement attempt detected using SMB session enumeration.
Unauthorized attempt to disable antivirus service on endpoint.
Endpoint communicating with a known command-and-control (C2) IP address.
User account created outside normal provisioning workflow.
Suspicious DNS tunneling patterns detected from internal host.
